document_data.name: Wyrm River
document_data.georefs: <ref group="note" name="note">Wyrm River is not named on any map; however, its description in ''[[The Titan of Twilight]]'' only corresponds to one river shown on that book's map.
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyrm River''' in [[Hartsvale]] was a tributary of the [[Clear Whirl River]].<ref group="note" name="note" />
document_data.Description: Wyrm River froze solid in the winter months.
document_data.Geography: The river flowed from the [[Ice Spires|Ice Spires South]], through the [[Gorge of the Silver Wyrm]], and fed the Clear Whirl.
